Articles.Content:
The Orbital Drop Trooper Frigate [GODI]

Here's my first Warship/Support Ship.

Warning this ship is not designed for combat its job is to Drop into a low orbit and drop two KEV (Kerbal Entry Vehicle) pods then escape back to high orbit.

Armed with four X-1 missiles for defense against larger ships and will eventually have a fighter escort.

Anyway heres where i need your help, I need someone to come up with a name.

I reallt don't know ... The only word who cames to my mouth is : Persillade (According to Google Translate it's means parsley ...)

Maybe the "Type-25 "Spirit"", Like in Halo

http://halo.wikia.com/wiki/Type-25_Troop_Carrier

I reallt don't know ... The only word who cames to my mouth is : Persillade (According to Google Translate it's means parsley ...)

Maybe the "Type-25 "Spirit"", Like in Halo

http://halo.wikia.com/wiki/Type-25_Troop_Carrier

I like that name maybe I'll use it. By the way big fan of Halo

Can we have some more pictures?

Just give me a few minutes

Not too shabby! Especially for being your first "warship"! I agree with Redshift, though. More pictures.

Coincidentally, I'm currently working on a very similarly purposed ship for my own fleet. Only difference is mine's gonna be a bit... bigger:wink:

EDIT: Also, what's the part count?
